...wrote of "Tom Thumb" as well as "Tom Jones"

Fort Peck Dam on this river in Montana provides irrigation & hydroelectric power for much of the region

(Jimmy of the Clue Crew hangs out outside a storied building--UC San Diego's Scripps Revelle Lab.)  Scripps Revelle Lab is named forRoger Revelle, whose 1960 class at Harvard influenced this Nobel Prize winner to investigate global warming
